vsParam:
Uh, Sterk? Why are you reading the
commission with such a fierce look...

Is there any super power monster,
that makes you show such a sinister expression?

No...
I didn't mean to look like that.
It seems that your eye expression could kill the monster...
So, you have a fierce look all along...
Even I have no such power...

That's what you think...
But it really wasn't intentionally...

I, I am... sorry!
We are being rude!

Never mind, people say that about me all the time.
I gotta go——
What? May, may I ask... where are you going!?

I am going to undertake the commission
posted here and kill the monster.

The monster doesn't seem very powerful,
but it seems that the residents are harmed.
I better strike it down before more people get hurt.

Ah... D, do you mind... if I tag along? I want to learn
the swordsmanship of a knight from another world!

Of course you can come.
Get prepared, and then we shall go.

T, thanks!
I'll go prepare now!

I mean, shall we go with them too?
I want to see Sterk's real strength!

That's it, huh? I won't allow you to do evils again,
be ready to die!

Finally, I got a chance to see... the swordsmanship
of another world, what will it be like!!

Hey, Cresson, don't get distracted!
Look at the front, the front!! The monster is coming!
You are really a knight! So powerful!
The knights' skills... are indeed exceptional!

No, I am not good enough. I should have killed
it with one hit, yet I used your help.

Hehe. Still got time to observe others amid the battle, huh?
I don't know if you are overconfident or lack a sense of crisis...

I should have killed the monster alone, but I used your help.
Anyway, thanks for the assistance.

Uh. Sometimes, killing the monsters
come as our assignment!

Hey, I mean, Cresson!
Did you do something to offend him?

When we fought the monster just now,
you ran around Sterk!

Look how fierce he is!
Apologize to him, now!

Ah, no, uh! S, Sterk...
Hmm... Did I do something to upset you?
If so, I apologize! I am really sorry!

No... You are Cresson, right? Despite of your young age,
you have a good comprehension of battles.

Although you still had some extra movements,
besides that, your performance was praiseworthy.

What? R, really!?
I, I am honored!

You were staring at the monster with a fierce look,
I thought I did something wrong...

... Er. I didn't do that on purpose, either...
I never imagine that I'd be called fierce twice in one day...

Ah, no, hmm...
I just blurted!

I paid attention to expression management...
How come there's no effect.
Looks like you need to work harder in this regard.

You, you really... care about that, huh?
Hmm, I am... sorry...
